name: Master's Salvage Kit
description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an item in your inventory. 25% chance of rarer materials. 80% chance of recovering upgrades from items.

name: Basic Salvage Kit
description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an item in your inventory. 10% chance of rarer materials. 20% chance of recovering upgrades.

name: Mystic Salvage Kit
description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an item in your inventory. 25% chance of rarer materials. 80% chance of recovering upgrades from items.

name: Orange Lucky Rabbit's Foot
description:
"This rabbit died of natural causes!"
—Dena

name: Crude Salvage Kit
description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an item in your inventory. Has a small chance of recovering upgrades from items.

name: Emerald Pendant
description: True courage understands the importance of fear.

name: Sapphire Pendant
description: Wisdom comes with experience, not age.

name: PvP Salvage Kit
description: Double-click to salvage materials from a PvP reward item in your inventory. These materials can be recombined in the Mystic Forge.
